name: Nebula Crusaders
description:
Modifications made:

  • The game is no longer level-based.
  • Added 3 black hole-enemy spawners : 2 fixed which spawn Simple Chasers and 1 moving which spawns both Single and Double Shooting Chasers.
  • Energy mechanic added, with 2 new commands (Dash and Super Fire).
  • In-Game GUI modified (Health and Energy bar and Minimap added).
  • General game balance modified.
  • Main menu modified.
  • Instructions Menu modified.
  • Game background redecorated.
